title: Is wearing jeans imitating the non-muslims?
transcript: permissible to wear jeans and t-shirts as the deand scholars here in India says it's imitation of the Western World answer is definitely yes I wear jeans and t-shirts and whenever I travel abroad this is halal the majority of Muslims wear it no one would see me with my beard with my short trousers and say ah this guy is a Westerner no they would definitely identify me as a Muslim because the millions and millions of Muslims wear it so there's nothing wrong in that say it says
